Given the extremely high mortality associated with EVD and the limited number of laboratories with the capability to study such a pathogenic virus, there is much that remains unanswered about the potential reproductive sequelae of EVD.
57 In rhesus monkeys, it has been shown that although Marburg infection had a deleterious effect on Sertoli cells, the overall reproductive function of the Sertoli cells was unaffected. Spermatogenesis was unaffected, and tissue morphology was normal.
51 Further studies are needed to determine if semen parameters or reproductive capacity are altered in male survivors of EVD.
